sourcesContent:
const mvp = require('./mvp');


module.exports = [mvp];

value.code:
"use strict";

var Recipe = "#graphql
    type Recipe {
        recipe_id: ID!
        steps: [String!]!
        date: String!
        userid: ID!
        title: String!
        link: [String!]
        cookingtime_min: Int!
        views: Int!
        votes: Int!
        imageurl: String
    }
";
var GetRecipeByIdType = "#graphql
    type Return_GetRecipeById {

        #ingredient data
        ing_imgurl: [String]
        presentedstring: [String!],
        unit: [String],
        value: [Int],
        valueingram: [Float],
        ingredient_name: [String!]!,
        calories: [Float!]!
        total_fat: [Float!]!
        sat_fat: [Float!]!
        protein: [Float!]!
        sodium: [Float!]!
        potassium: [Float!]!
        cholestrol: [Float!]!
        carbohydrates: [Float!]!
        fiber: [Float!]!
        sugar: [Float!]!
        category: [Float!]!

        #user data
        userid: ID!

        #recipe data
        #recipe_id: ID!
        recipe_id: ID!
        steps: [String!]!
        date: String!
        title: String!
        link: [String!]
        cookingtime_min: Int!
        views: Int!
        votes: Int!
        recipe_imgurl: [String]

        image: String
    }
";
var GetUserRecipesType = "#graphql
    type Return_GetUserRecipes {

        #ingredient data
        ing_imgurl: [String]
        presentedstring: [String!]
        unit: [String]
        value: [Int]
        valueingram: [Float]
        ingredient_name: [String!]!
        calories: [Float!]!
        total_fat: [Float!]!
        sat_fat: [Float!]!
        protein: [Float!]!
        sodium: [Float!]!
        potassium: [Float!]!
        cholestrol: [Float!]!
        carbohydrates: [Float!]!
        fiber: [Float!]!
        sugar: [Float!]!
        category: [Float!]!

        #user data
        userid: ID!

        #recipe data
        #recipe_id: ID!
        recipe_id: ID!
        steps: [String!]!
        date: String!
        title: String!
        link: [String!]
        cookingtime_min: Int!
        views: Int!
        votes: Int!
        recipe_imgurl: [String]

        image: String
    }
";
var CreateRecipeType = "#graphql
    input Args_CreateRecipe{
        steps: [String!]!
        title: String!
        link: [String!]
        cookingtime_min: Int!
        recipe_imageurl: String

        ingredients_id: [ID!]!

        tags: [String!]

        units: [String!]!
        values: [Int!]!
        valuesingram: [Float!]!

        image: String

    }
";
var EditRecipeType = "#graphql
    input Args_EditRecipe{
        recipe_id: ID!
        steps: [String!]!
        title: String!
        link: [String!]
        cookingtime_min: Int!
        recipe_imageurl: String

        ingredients_id: [ID!]!

        tags: [String!]

        units: [String!]!
        values: [Int!]!
        valuesingram: [Float!]!

        image: String

    }
";
var SearchRecipesType = "#graphql
    type Return_SearchRecipes {

        #ingredient data
        ing_imgurl: [String]
        presentedstring: [String!]
        unit: [String]
        value: [Int]
        valueingram: [Float]
        ingredient_name: [String!]!
        calories: [Float!]!
        total_fat: [Float!]!
        sat_fat: [Float!]!
        protein: [Float!]!
        sodium: [Float!]!
        potassium: [Float!]!
        cholestrol: [Float!]!
        carbohydrates: [Float!]!
        fiber: [Float!]!
        sugar: [Float!]!
        category: [Float!]!

        #user data
        userid: ID!

        #recipe data
        #recipe_id: ID!
        recipe_id: ID!
        steps: [String!]!
        date: String!
        title: String!
        link: [String!]
        cookingtime_min: Int!
        views: Int!
        votes: Int!
        recipe_imgurl: [String]

        image: String

    }
";
module.exports = {
  Recipe: Recipe,
  GetRecipeByIdType: GetRecipeByIdType,
  CreateRecipeType: CreateRecipeType,
  EditRecipeType: EditRecipeType,
  GetUserRecipesType: GetUserRecipesType,
  SearchRecipesType: SearchRecipesType
};
//# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;charset=utf-8;base64,

sourcesContent:
const Recipe = `#graphql
    type Recipe {
        recipe_id: ID!
        steps: [String!]!
        date: String!
        userid: ID!
        title: String!
        link: [String!]
        cookingtime_min: Int!
        views: Int!
        votes: Int!
        imageurl: String
    }
`

const GetRecipeByIdType = `#graphql
    type Return_GetRecipeById {

        #ingredient data
        ing_imgurl: [String]
        presentedstring: [String!],
        unit: [String],
        value: [Int],
        valueingram: [Float],
        ingredient_name: [String!]!,
        calories: [Float!]!
        total_fat: [Float!]!
        sat_fat: [Float!]!
        protein: [Float!]!
        sodium: [Float!]!
        potassium: [Float!]!
        cholestrol: [Float!]!
        carbohydrates: [Float!]!
        fiber: [Float!]!
        sugar: [Float!]!
        category: [Float!]!

        #user data
        userid: ID!

        #recipe data
        #recipe_id: ID!
        recipe_id: ID!
        steps: [String!]!
        date: String!
        title: String!
        link: [String!]
        cookingtime_min: Int!
        views: Int!
        votes: Int!
        recipe_imgurl: [String]

        image: String
    }
`

const GetUserRecipesType = `#graphql
    type Return_GetUserRecipes {

        #ingredient data
        ing_imgurl: [String]
        presentedstring: [String!]
        unit: [String]
        value: [Int]
        valueingram: [Float]
        ingredient_name: [String!]!
        calories: [Float!]!
        total_fat: [Float!]!
        sat_fat: [Float!]!
        protein: [Float!]!
        sodium: [Float!]!
        potassium: [Float!]!
        cholestrol: [Float!]!
        carbohydrates: [Float!]!
        fiber: [Float!]!
        sugar: [Float!]!
        category: [Float!]!

        #user data
        userid: ID!

        #recipe data
        #recipe_id: ID!
        recipe_id: ID!
        steps: [String!]!
        date: String!
        title: String!
        link: [String!]
        cookingtime_min: Int!
        views: Int!
        votes: Int!
        recipe_imgurl: [String]

        image: String
    }
`

const CreateRecipeType = `#graphql
    input Args_CreateRecipe{
        steps: [String!]!
        title: String!
        link: [String!]
        cookingtime_min: Int!
        recipe_imageurl: String

        ingredients_id: [ID!]!

        tags: [String!]

        units: [String!]!
        values: [Int!]!
        valuesingram: [Float!]!

        image: String

    }
`

const EditRecipeType = `#graphql
    input Args_EditRecipe{
        recipe_id: ID!
        steps: [String!]!
        title: String!
        link: [String!]
        cookingtime_min: Int!
        recipe_imageurl: String

        ingredients_id: [ID!]!

        tags: [String!]

        units: [String!]!
        values: [Int!]!
        valuesingram: [Float!]!

        image: String

    }
`

const SearchRecipesType = `#graphql
    type Return_SearchRecipes {

        #ingredient data
        ing_imgurl: [String]
        presentedstring: [String!]
        unit: [String]
        value: [Int]
        valueingram: [Float]
        ingredient_name: [String!]!
        calories: [Float!]!
        total_fat: [Float!]!
        sat_fat: [Float!]!
        protein: [Float!]!
        sodium: [Float!]!
        potassium: [Float!]!
        cholestrol: [Float!]!
        carbohydrates: [Float!]!
        fiber: [Float!]!
        sugar: [Float!]!
        category: [Float!]!

        #user data
        userid: ID!

        #recipe data
        #recipe_id: ID!
        recipe_id: ID!
        steps: [String!]!
        date: String!
        title: String!
        link: [String!]
        cookingtime_min: Int!
        views: Int!
        votes: Int!
        recipe_imgurl: [String]

        image: String

    }
`




module.exports = {
    Recipe,
    GetRecipeByIdType,
    CreateRecipeType,
    EditRecipeType,
    GetUserRecipesType,
    SearchRecipesType
};

const Ingredient = `#graphql
    type Ingredient {
        name: String!
        calories: Float!
        total_fat: Float!
        sat_fat: Float!
        protein: Float!
        sodium: Float!
        potassium: Float!
        cholesterol: Float!
        carbohydrates: Float!
        fiber: Float!
        sugar: Float!
        category: String!
        imageurl: String
    }
`

const GetIngredientByIdType = `#graphql
    type Return_GetIngredientById {

        #ingredient data
        ingredient_name: String!
        ing_imageurl: String
        calories: Float!

        sat_fat: Float!
        protein: Float!
        sodium: Float!
        potassium: Float!
        cholestrol: Float!

        fiber: Float!

        category: Float!

        potassium: Float!
        cholestrol: Float!
        carbohydrates: Float!

        category: Float!

    }
`




module.exports = {
    Ingredient,
    GetIngredientByIdType,
    SearchIngredientType
};

module.exports = [mvp];

value.code:
"use strict";

var Recipe = "#graphql
    type Recipe {

        votes: Int!

        r_sat_fat: Float!

const Recipe = `#graphql
    type Recipe {
        recipe_id: ID!
        steps: [String!]!
        date: String!
        userid: ID!
        title: String!
        link: [String!]
        cookingtime_min: Int!
        views: Int!
        votes: Int!
        imageurl: String
        vote: Int! 

        #nutrition

        r_sat_fat: Float!
        r_protein: Float!
        r_sodium: Float!
        r_potassium: Float!
        r_cholestrol: Float!

`

    type Return_SearchIngredients {

        #ingredient data

        ing_imageurl: String

        protein: Float!

sourcesContent:
const Ingredient = `#graphql
    type Ingredient {
        name: String!
        calories: Float!
        total_fat: Float!
        sat_fat: Float!
        protein: Float!
        sodium: Float!
        potassium: Float!
        cholesterol: Float!
        carbohydrates: Float!
        fiber: Float!
        sugar: Float!
        category: String!
        imageurl: String
    }
`

const GetIngredientByIdType = `#graphql
    type Return_GetIngredientById {

        #ingredient data
        ingredient_name: String!
        ing_imageurl: String
        calories: Float!
        total_fat: Float!
        sat_fat: Float!
        protein: Float!
        sodium: Float!
        potassium: Float!
        cholestrol: Float!
        carbohydrates: Float!
        fiber: Float!
        sugar: Float!
        category: Float!

    }
`


const SearchIngredientType = `#graphql
    type Return_SearchIngredients {

        #ingredient data
        ingredient_name: String!
        ing_imageurl: String
        calories: Float!
        total_fat: Float!
        sat_fat: Float!
        protein: Float!
        sodium: Float!
        potassium: Float!
        cholestrol: Float!
        carbohydrates: Float!
        fiber: Float!
        sugar: Float!
        category: Float!

    }
`




module.exports = {
    Ingredient,
    GetIngredientByIdType,
    SearchIngredientType
};
